content: looks like rfcbot didn't remove the finished-final-comment-period label on #87096, so it's not showing up in the dashboard even though the FCP is restarted. dunno if changing the labels is enough, or whether rfcbot has additional state that needs adjusting? or maybe i'm misunderstanding how the process is supposed to work.
oh, maybe the dashboard is only PFCPs? but i still wonder if it might get missed somewhere because it has the label finished-final-comment-period
looks like rfcbot didn't pick up on the FCP ending on #87096, possibly because finished-final-comment-period was already set. does this need to be fixed manually?
Yeah. The final comment period ended two days ago, and I think it can go forward.

thanks! i might try to open an issue in rfcbot-rs, assuming i can describe the failure mode accurately enough. it might be tricky because there might be actual policy choices to make for tracking issues that get into this situation

Taylor Yu [they/she] said:

thanks! i might try to open an issue in rfcbot-rs, assuming i can describe the failure mode accurately enough. it might be tricky because there might be actual policy choices to make for tracking issues that get into this situation

rust-lang/rfcbot-rs#302
it might also need the to-announce label? i'm not sure what automations depend on that
